snippet: Kendall Marshall was the last option for a change Saturday afternoon and made an old-school bank shot that saved North Carolina from elimination in the Atlantic Coast Conference tournament.
lead_paragraph: Kendall Marshall was the last option for a change Saturday afternoon and made an old-school bank shot that saved North Carolina from elimination in the Atlantic Coast Conference tournament.

headline.seo: For Tar Heels, Last Shot and Next Opponent Are Both a Surprise
headline.main: For Tar Heels, Last Shot and Next Opponent Are Both a Surprise

headline.content_kicker: North Carolina 69, N.C. State 67 | Florida State 62, Duke 59
